title: How should one start preparing for GMAT? - Quora

response.answer_text: Step 1: Get familiar with the GMAT format. It has two sections: QUANTITATIVE & VERBAL. Step 2: Solve few sample questions. Step 3: Identify which in your strength among the two. Step 4: Polish your strength and work on your weakness. Step 5: Use standards books for GMAT prep/join a nearby coaching center. Step 6: Give lot of mock tests to improvise your previous score. Step 7: You’re done!
